EmailTemplate.name: 20NovWeb-Workflow-Mgmt.TM Missed
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you - Resources from our Time Management Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
You were missed at our "Workflow and Time Management Tips for the Self-Employed Workforce" webinar held on Wednesday, November 20. Perry J. Pockros, an executive consultant, facilitator and trainer, presented a 3 part workflow framework: (1) why things are on your mind, (2) the Getting Things Done model, and (3) tactics and tools for success. Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. Remember: the slides are copywritten material, so please do not repost or repurpose in any way. Recorded webinar <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/OVFsA6Ke-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO-Workflow-Mgmt-Webinar-11.20.13.pdf> Full SOI Report (PDF) <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/2013-MBO_Partners_State_of_Independence_Report.pdf> ___________________________________
Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368
e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com
w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
